text:
C. Malarkodi (32), an Assistant Public Prosecutor Grade-II, has taken over as legal advisor to City Police Commissioner.

S. Shanmugam, Director of Prosecution, told The Hindu that the government had appointed Ms. Malarkodi in place of S. Vadivelu.

M. Kavitha, another Assistant Public Prosecutor Grade- II, had replaced Prince Samuel Raj as APP.
title: Assumes office
